short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore and Discover The World of Vermont Craft Beer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Searching for a single source of information on Vermont Craft Beer and Vermont's Craft Brewers can be as challenging as driving around up here.

VT Beer Trail is an introductory travel guide to the brewers and their work and spirit that are a part of our towns and our communities.

Worth the detour!

N.B. The "permissions" are just access to Google services like Maps, that's how extensions work, nothing more!  Also, sadly, in Chrome on Mac OSX, the scrollbar for the list page is being hidden by the Mac, and the swipe gesture on the trackpad doesn't take over.  We love Mac users, but this one is out of our hands.
